explanation: The majority of relevant opinions discourage shorting BTC, suggesting a bullish sentiment. Comments like 'dont short a bull market' and 'this is going up more your short liq' support an upward trend. There is mention of a potential 'head and shoulders' (bearish pattern), but the prevailing real-time sentiment is not to short and to expect more upside. No clear consensus on extreme bullishness, but bias is to the upside.
representative_opinions: Islandsteve: dont short are you nuts
Islandsteve: dont short a bull market
Alhamaf: It will form head and shoulder
Islandsteve: this is going up more your short liq
TioRyo: I don't think it's time
